Articles.Content:
Not sure if this is a late discovery, but recently I found out how to add in a hidden part into your game!

  1. First go to your GameData folder and go to the NASAmission folder.
  2. Go to parts
  3. Click on the "PotatoRoid" folder
  4. Click on the part config
  5. Choose the tech node and category you want the potatoroid to be in!
  6. Have fun with your homemade asteroids!

Be careful because if something goes wrong your ships are gonna dissapear.

Make backups!

Edited April 5, 2014 by Clockwork13

Now we can have an Infinite supply of rocks at ksc

Edited April 5, 2014 by Mach_XXII

You also need to add it to a parts tab so in the config replace none with utility

That's what I did. I put it in the tech node "actuators" so I could mess around with it in career mode.

And the config even has VAB info:

title = A potato like rock

manufacturer = The Solar system

description = Big ole, rock like thing.

I didn't notice they were called potatoroids anyways.

Im gonna build a mountain!

Chad told me about the potatoroid name back at SXSW while mentioning the idea of a giant potato as a moonlet around Jool.

I dunno, I like the idea of a space potato entering the atmosphere of kerbin and being turned into a badly cooked baked potato.

Chad told me about the potatoroid name back at SXSW while mentioning the idea of a giant potato as a moonlet around Jool.

I dunno, I like the idea of a space potato entering the atmosphere of kerbin and being turned into a badly cooked baked potato.

...and explodes into chips when it hits the ground!
I told you, gilly is an asteroid, gilly is a potato!
